channel.title: Run client help
channel.description: Hi, on my server i have a custom client and when other players run it it doesnt work because they dont have JDK. Can I make it so you only need JRE to run the client? here is my run server code [code]@echo off COLOR 09 title Str3ngthscap3 client V1 @echo Client Is loading...... @echo ----------------------- java -Xmx512m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32 pause java -Xmx1000m[/code]

item.title: Run client help
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Use this instead.

@echo off
COLOR 09
title Str3ngthscap3 client V1
echo Client Is loadingâ€¦
echo -----------------------
java -Xmx512m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Run client help
item.dc:creator: @suppyscape suppyscape
item.description:
@suppyscape wrote:

Hi, on my server i have a custom client and when other players run it it doesnt work because they dont have JDK. Can I make it so you only need JRE to run the client? here is my run server code

@echo off COLOR 09 title Str3ngthscap3 client V1 @echo Client Is loading...... @echo ----------------------- java -Xmx512m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32 pause java -Xmx1000m

Read full topic
